abstract.text: Initializes a submesh with an index buffer and the specified properties.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: An object that provides index data for the submesh.
The number of indices in the index buffer.
The data type of each index in the index buffer.
The type of geometric primitives described by the index buffer.
A description of the intended surface appearance for rendering the submesh.
Typically, a submesh is imported from an asset file as a member of a
object, but you can also use this method to create a submesh programmatically.

abstract.text: Import, export, and manipulate 3D models using a common infrastructure that integrates MetalKit, GLKit, and SceneKit.
Types of geometric primitives for rendering a submesh, used by the
Options for the size of integer data in a submesh’s index buffer, used by the
A collection of material properties that together describe the intended surface appearance for rendering a 3D object.
A container for vertex buffer data to be used in rendering a 3D object.
The general interface for managing storage of vertex and index data used in loading, processing, and rendering meshes.
A container for index buffer data and material information to be used in rendering all or part of a 3D object.
The type of geometric primitives described by the submesh’s index buffer.
The data type for each element in the submesh’s index buffer.
Initializes a submesh with an index buffer and the specified properties.
Initializes a submesh by copying or converting another submesh.
Initializes a named submesh with an index buffer and the specified properties.
Initializes a named submesh with a specific topology.
